title: Fantastically light CADEX 160g “one-piece” carbon handlebar is about more than just weight
content:
Some companies are trimming down their high-end lines, while others like CADEX are expanding into new territory. Their recent super high-end wheels with carbon spokes are a perfect example, as are the checkerboard carbon weave aero wheels on Team CCC time trial bikes. Now, CADEX is adding to the component realm with super lightweight carbon road bars using […]

The post Fantastically light CADEX 160g “one-piece” carbon handlebar is about more than just weight appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
